title: CHEMICAL MECHANICAL POLISHING SLURRY COMPOSITION AND METHOD FOR PRODUCING SEMICONDUCTOR DEVICE USING THE SAME

samples.experiment_context: Experiment Example 1-1: 35 nm colloidal silica, surface treated with 0.25 wt% gamma-aminopropyltriethoxysilane, pH 3.40. Base slurry: 5 wt% abrasive, 0.1 wt% 5-aminotetrazole, 1.0 wt% H2O2.

abrasive_synthesis.description: Colloidal silica synthesis details not provided in the patent text. Surface treated with gamma-aminopropyltriethoxysilane.

slurry_preparation.description: Slurry prepared by mixing components. pH adjusted using Nitric Acid / Potassium Hydroxide.

abrasive.material: Colloidal Silica, surface treated with 0.25 wt% gamma-aminopropyltriethoxysilane

processing.description: pH adjusted using Nitric Acid / Potassium Hydroxide.

characterization.stability: Stated as excellent in patent description, no quantitative data.
